item.description:
Please join us for Inspirational and Timely messages from a group of EnLightened Beings from the Pleiades Star System, that call themselves "The Light One". Judith Grant, a full trance medium and channel will be channeling messages from the Light One at Pathways To Health on Aug 6, 2010. The Light One has the charge of bringing the Goddess Energy to our planet at this time of change and transformation. The have given us essential information about helping to heal the bleeding earth, taught us about the very powerful An-Ra Energy Healing System, the upcoming earth changes and about raising the vibration of the planet. These are only some of the topics that have been shared in the past.

The format includes about a 45 minute message from the Light One and then the audience is free to ask questions of the Light One.

Date Friday Night Aug. 6th.
Time: 7:30 pm
Location: Pathways To Health
77 Shore Rd.
Mt. Sinai, NY. 11766
Phone 631 642 2200
Fee $50
item.how_to_find_us: Judith and William will be welcoming you
item.name: Live Channeling of "The Light One" Fee $50
